00026 #ifndef NOISEPP_SELECT_H
00027 #define NOISEPP_SELECT_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoisePipeline.h"
00030 #include "NoiseModule.h"
00031 
00032 namespace noisepp
00033 {
00034         class SelectElement1D : public PipelineElement1D
00035         {
00036                 private:
00037                         ElementID mLeft, mRight, mControl;
00038                         const PipelineElement1D *mLeftPtr;
00039                         const PipelineElement1D *mRightPtr;
00040                         const PipelineElement1D *mControlPtr;
00041                         Real mLowerBound, mUpperBound;
00042                         Real mLowerBoundPlusFalloff, mLowerBoundMinusFalloff;
00043                         Real mUpperBoundPlusFalloff, mUpperBoundMinusFalloff;
00044                         Real mEdgeFalloff, mTwoEdgeFalloff;
00045 
00046                 public:
00047                         SelectElement1D (const Pipeline1D *pipe, ElementID left, ElementID right, ElementID control, Real lowerBound, Real upperBound, Real edgeFalloff) : mLeft(left), mRight(right), mControl(control), mLowerBound(lowerBound), mUpperBound(upperBound), mEdgeFalloff(edgeFalloff)
00048                         {
00049                                 NoiseAssert (mLowerBound < mUpperBound, (mLowerBound, mUpperBound));
00050 
00051                                 mLeftPtr = pipe->getElement(mLeft);
00052                                 mRightPtr = pipe->getElement(mRight);
00053                                 mControlPtr = pipe->getElement(mControl);
00054 
00055                                 mLowerBoundPlusFalloff = mLowerBound + mEdgeFalloff;
00056                                 mLowerBoundMinusFalloff = mLowerBound - mEdgeFalloff;
00057                                 mUpperBoundPlusFalloff = mUpperBound + mEdgeFalloff;
00058                                 mUpperBoundMinusFalloff = mUpperBound - mEdgeFalloff;
00059                                 mTwoEdgeFalloff = Real(2.0) * mEdgeFalloff;
00060                         }
00061                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Cache *cache) const
00062                         {
00063                                 Real controlValue = getElementValue (mControlPtr, mControl, x, cache);
00064                                 Real alpha;
00065                                 if (mEdgeFalloff > 0.0)
00066                                 {
00067                                         if (controlValue < mLowerBoundMinusFalloff)
00068                                         {
00069                                                 return getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, cache);
00070                                         }
00071                                         else if (controlValue < mLowerBoundPlusFalloff)
00072                                         {
00073                                                 alpha = Math::CubicCurve3 ((controlValue - mLowerBoundMinusFalloff) / mTwoEdgeFalloff);
00074                                                 return Math::InterpLinear (
00075                                                         getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, cache),
00076                                                         getElementValue (mRightPtr, mRight, x, cache),
00077                                                         alpha);
00078                                         }
00079                                         else if (controlValue < mUpperBoundMinusFalloff)
00080                                         {
00081                                                 return getElementValue (mRightPtr, mRight, x, cache);
00082                                         }
00083                                         else if (controlValue < mUpperBoundPlusFalloff)
00084                                         {
00085                                                 alpha = Math::CubicCurve3 ((controlValue - mUpperBoundMinusFalloff) / mTwoEdgeFalloff);
00086                                                 return Math::InterpLinear (
00087                                                         getElementValue (mRightPtr, mRight, x, cache),
00088                                                         getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, cache),
00089                                                         alpha);
00090                                         }
00091                                         else
00092                                         {
00093                                                 return getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, cache);
00094                                         }
00095                                 }
00096                                 else
00097                                 {
00098                                         if (controlValue < mLowerBound || controlValue > mUpperBound)
00099                                         {
00100                                                 return getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, cache);
00101                                         }
00102                                         else
00103                                         {
00104                                                 return getElementValue (mRightPtr, mRight, x, cache);
00105                                         }
00106                                 }
00107                         }
00108         };
00109 
00110         class SelectElement2D : public PipelineElement2D
00111         {
00112                 private:
00113                         ElementID mLeft, mRight, mControl;
00114                         const PipelineElement2D *mLeftPtr;
00115                         const PipelineElement2D *mRightPtr;
00116                         const PipelineElement2D *mControlPtr;
00117                         Real mLowerBound, mUpperBound;
00118                         Real mLowerBoundPlusFalloff, mLowerBoundMinusFalloff;
00119                         Real mUpperBoundPlusFalloff, mUpperBoundMinusFalloff;
00120                         Real mEdgeFalloff, mTwoEdgeFalloff;
00121 
00122                 public:
00123                         SelectElement2D (const Pipeline2D *pipe, ElementID left, ElementID right, ElementID control, Real lowerBound, Real upperBound, Real edgeFalloff) : mLeft(left), mRight(right), mControl(control), mLowerBound(lowerBound), mUpperBound(upperBound), mEdgeFalloff(edgeFalloff)
00124                         {
00125                                 NoiseAssert (mLowerBound < mUpperBound, (mLowerBound, mUpperBound));
00126 
00127                                 mLeftPtr = pipe->getElement(mLeft);
00128                                 mRightPtr = pipe->getElement(mRight);
00129                                 mControlPtr = pipe->getElement(mControl);
00130 
00131                                 mLowerBoundPlusFalloff = mLowerBound + mEdgeFalloff;
00132                                 mLowerBoundMinusFalloff = mLowerBound - mEdgeFalloff;
00133                                 mUpperBoundPlusFalloff = mUpperBound + mEdgeFalloff;
00134                                 mUpperBoundMinusFalloff = mUpperBound - mEdgeFalloff;
00135                                 mTwoEdgeFalloff = Real(2.0) * mEdgeFalloff;
00136                         }
00137                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Cache *cache) const
00138                         {
00139                                 Real controlValue = getElementValue (mControlPtr, mControl, x, y, cache);
00140                                 Real alpha;
00141                                 if (mEdgeFalloff > 0.0)
00142                                 {
00143                                         if (controlValue < mLowerBoundMinusFalloff)
00144                                         {
00145                                                 return getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, y, cache);
00146                                         }
00147                                         else if (controlValue < mLowerBoundPlusFalloff)
00148                                         {
00149                                                 alpha = Math::CubicCurve3 ((controlValue - mLowerBoundMinusFalloff) / mTwoEdgeFalloff);
00150                                                 return Math::InterpLinear (
00151                                                         getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, y, cache),
00152                                                         getElementValue (mRightPtr, mRight, x, y, cache),
00153                                                         alpha);
00154                                         }
00155                                         else if (controlValue < mUpperBoundMinusFalloff)
00156                                         {
00157                                                 return getElementValue (mRightPtr, mRight, x, y, cache);
00158                                         }
00159                                         else if (controlValue < mUpperBoundPlusFalloff)
00160                                         {
00161                                                 alpha = Math::CubicCurve3 ((controlValue - mUpperBoundMinusFalloff) / mTwoEdgeFalloff);
00162                                                 return Math::InterpLinear (
00163                                                         getElementValue (mRightPtr, mRight, x, y, cache),
00164                                                         getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, y, cache),
00165                                                         alpha);
00166                                         }
00167                                         else
00168                                         {
00169                                                 return getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, y, cache);
00170                                         }
00171                                 }
00172                                 else
00173                                 {
00174                                         if (controlValue < mLowerBound || controlValue > mUpperBound)
00175                                         {
00176                                                 return getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, y, cache);
00177                                         }
00178                                         else
00179                                         {
00180                                                 return getElementValue (mRightPtr, mRight, x, y, cache);
00181                                         }
00182                                 }
00183                         }
00184         };
00185 
00186         class SelectElement3D : public PipelineElement3D
00187         {
00188                 private:
00189                         ElementID mLeft, mRight, mControl;
00190                         const PipelineElement3D *mLeftPtr;
00191                         const PipelineElement3D *mRightPtr;
00192                         const PipelineElement3D *mControlPtr;
00193                         Real mLowerBound, mUpperBound;
00194                         Real mLowerBoundPlusFalloff, mLowerBoundMinusFalloff;
00195                         Real mUpperBoundPlusFalloff, mUpperBoundMinusFalloff;
00196                         Real mEdgeFalloff, mTwoEdgeFalloff;
00197 
00198                 public:
00199                         SelectElement3D (const Pipeline3D *pipe, ElementID left, ElementID right, ElementID control, Real lowerBound, Real upperBound, Real edgeFalloff) : mLeft(left), mRight(right), mControl(control), mLowerBound(lowerBound), mUpperBound(upperBound), mEdgeFalloff(edgeFalloff)
00200                         {
00201                                 NoiseAssert (mLowerBound < mUpperBound, (mLowerBound, mUpperBound));
00202 
00203                                 mLeftPtr = pipe->getElement(mLeft);
00204                                 mRightPtr = pipe->getElement(mRight);
00205                                 mControlPtr = pipe->getElement(mControl);
00206 
00207                                 mLowerBoundPlusFalloff = mLowerBound + mEdgeFalloff;
00208                                 mLowerBoundMinusFalloff = mLowerBound - mEdgeFalloff;
00209                                 mUpperBoundPlusFalloff = mUpperBound + mEdgeFalloff;
00210                                 mUpperBoundMinusFalloff = mUpperBound - mEdgeFalloff;
00211                                 mTwoEdgeFalloff = Real(2.0) * mEdgeFalloff;
00212                         }
00213                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Real z, Cache *cache) const
00214                         {
00215                                 Real controlValue = getElementValue (mControlPtr, mControl, x, y, z, cache);
00216                                 Real alpha;
00217                                 if (mEdgeFalloff > 0.0)
00218                                 {
00219                                         if (controlValue < mLowerBoundMinusFalloff)
00220                                         {
00221                                                 return getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, y, z, cache);
00222                                         }
00223                                         else if (controlValue < mLowerBoundPlusFalloff)
00224                                         {
00225                                                 alpha = Math::CubicCurve3 ((controlValue - mLowerBoundMinusFalloff) / mTwoEdgeFalloff);
00226                                                 return Math::InterpLinear (
00227                                                         getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, y, z, cache),
00228                                                         getElementValue (mRightPtr, mRight, x, y, z, cache),
00229                                                         alpha);
00230                                         }
00231                                         else if (controlValue < mUpperBoundMinusFalloff)
00232                                         {
00233                                                 return getElementValue (mRightPtr, mRight, x, y, z, cache);
00234                                         }
00235                                         else if (controlValue < mUpperBoundPlusFalloff)
00236                                         {
00237                                                 alpha = Math::CubicCurve3 ((controlValue - mUpperBoundMinusFalloff) / mTwoEdgeFalloff);
00238                                                 return Math::InterpLinear (
00239                                                         getElementValue (mRightPtr, mRight, x, y, z, cache),
00240                                                         getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, y, z, cache),
00241                                                         alpha);
00242                                         }
00243                                         else
00244                                         {
00245                                                 return getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, y, z, cache);
00246                                         }
00247                                 }
00248                                 else
00249                                 {
00250                                         if (controlValue < mLowerBound || controlValue > mUpperBound)
00251                                         {
00252                                                 return getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, y, z, cache);
00253                                         }
00254                                         else
00255                                         {
00256                                                 return getElementValue (mRightPtr, mRight, x, y, z, cache);
00257                                         }
00258                                 }
00259                         }
00260         };
00261 
00269         class SelectModule : public TripleSourceModuleBase
00270         {
00271                 private:
00272                         Real mLowerBound, mUpperBound;
00273                         Real mEdgeFalloff;
00274 
00275                 public:
00276                         SelectModule() : mLowerBound(-1.0), mUpperBound(1.0), mEdgeFalloff(0.0)
00277                         {
00278                         }
00280                         void setLowerBound (Real v)
00281                         {
00282                                 mLowerBound = v;
00283                         }
00285                         Real getLowerBound () const
00286                         {
00287                                 return mLowerBound;
00288                         }
00290                         void setUpperBound (Real v)
00291                         {
00292                                 mUpperBound = v;
00293                         }
00295                         Real getUpperBound () const
00296                         {
00297                                 return mUpperBound;
00298                         }
00300                         void setEdgeFalloff (Real v)
00301                         {
00302                                 const Real range = Real(0.5) * (mUpperBound - mLowerBound);
00303                                 mEdgeFalloff = (v > range) ? range : v;
00304                         }
00306                         Real getEdgeFalloff () const
00307                         {
00308                                 return mEdgeFalloff;
00309                         }
00311                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline1D *pipe) const
00312                         {
00313                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00314                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00315                                 ElementID second = getSourceModule(1)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00316                                 ElementID third = getSourceModule(2)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00317                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new SelectElement1D(pipe, first, second, third, mLowerBound, mUpperBound, mEdgeFalloff));
00318                         }
00320                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline2D *pipe) const
00321                         {
00322                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00323                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00324                                 ElementID second = getSourceModule(1)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00325                                 ElementID third = getSourceModule(2)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00326                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new SelectElement2D(pipe, first, second, third, mLowerBound, mUpperBound, mEdgeFalloff));
00327                         }
00329                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline3D *pipe) const
00330                         {
00331                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00332                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00333                                 ElementID second = getSourceModule(1)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00334                                 ElementID third = getSourceModule(2)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00335                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new SelectElement3D(pipe, first, second, third, mLowerBound, mUpperBound, mEdgeFalloff));
00336                         }
00338                         ModuleTypeId getType() const { return MODULE_SELECT; }
00339 #if NOISEPP_ENABLE_UTILS
00341                         virtual void write (utils::OutStream &stream) const;
00343                         virtual void read (utils::InStream &stream);
00344 #endif
00345         };
00346 };
00347 
00348 #endif
